document.full_text: if alberto contador's unstoppable form on the bike translates to the courtroom, he's got a good shot at an unprecedented sweep of cycling's three grand tours in one season.
document.title: alberto contador wins giro d'italia
lines_and_colors: if alberto contador's unstoppable form on the bike translates to the courtroom, he's got a good shot at an unprecedented sweep of cycling's three grand tours in one season.
